short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple note taking application that overlays the browser for a convenient quick jot. Saves to local browser storage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hello user. Thank you for checking out BrowserNotes.

BrowserNotes is a simple chrome extension for taking notes on your browser.
It takes a blob of text that you write/format and saves it to your browser's local storage (no network based saves for privacy).

It's quick to open and quick to close - just click the icon or set a hotkey on your keyboard for opening via chrome's settings (or the default, which is command+shift+9 on Mac and control+shift+9 on Windows).

A convenient companion app to your workspace which can be moved around your browser and is easily adjustable in size.

Useful keeping any kind of general notes without having to switch out of your browser. A simple and clean interface without any massive branding or clutter-filled messages.


App and design by Oath
Icon made by Kiranshastry from www.flaticon.com
